title: Capsula - Digital Time Capsule
subtitle: Add and lock text and images
shortDescription: Capsula is an app that allows users to create and store digital capsules of text and photos, which can be opened on a specific date in the future.
fullDescription: Capsula is an app that allows users to create and store digital capsules of text and photos, which can be opened on a specific date in the future.
Key Features:
- Create and customize digital capsules with text and images.
- Set a future opening date for your capsules.
- Secure storage with end-to-end encryption.
- Sync your capsules across all your devices with iCloud.
- User-friendly interface.

The app features seamless iCloud synchronization, allowing users to access their capsules across multiple devices signed in with the same Apple Account. Whether you want to preserve a special moment, send a message to your future self, or create a time capsule for loved ones, Time Capsule makes it easy and enjoyable.
With a strong emphasis on privacy and security, all user data is stored locally on the device and in iCloud using encryption, ensuring that your content remains private and secure.
Get Capsula today and start preserving your memories for the future!

productHuntBadge.productHuntBadgeAlt: Capsula - Digital Time Capsule | Product Hunt

title: QST - Quit Smoking Tracker
subtitle: Smoke-Free Life Monitoring
fullDescription: QST is your comprehensive guide to quitting smoking, with easy-to-track progress, motivational milestones, and financial insights that highlight the benefits of your journey to quit smoking. Track how long you've been smoke-free, see how much you've saved, and monitor your health improvements over time.
Progress Tracking: Track your days smoke-free, see immediate benefits, and stay motivated with key health milestones.
Money Saved Calculator: Watch your savings grow by seeing how much you've saved since quitting smoking based on your smoking habits.
Personalized Health Timeline: See your body's recovery stages with a detailed timeline that covers improvements in health, energy, and overall well-being.
QST is more than just a tracker; it's your partner in leading a healthier, smoke-free life. Quit smoking, save money, and rediscover your best self with QST!

title: Brownoise - True Brown Noise
subtitle: Relax, Focus, Sleep, Health
fullDescription: Immerse yourself in the soothing sounds of Brown Noise with our innovative Brownoise app. Designed to help you relax, concentrate, and sleep more soundly, this app offers a simple yet powerful audio experience.

Customizable Brown Noise Generation: Adjust the intensity, frequency, and gain to create the perfect sound environment tailored to your needs. Use the intuitive sliders to fine-tune the noise for relaxation or focus.
Timer Functionality: Set a timer for your brown noise session. Whether you want a quick power nap or a full night's sleep, our app allows you to enjoy uninterrupted sound for as long as you need.
User-Friendly Interface: The sleek design and straightforward navigation make it easy to adjust settings, view the timer, and access helpful information about each feature.

Brown Noise is known for its deep, soothing sound profile, which can help mask background noise, improve sleep quality, enhance concentration, and create a calming atmosphere. Whether you're studying, meditating, or trying to sleep, our app provides the auditory support you need to achieve your goals.
Transform your auditory environment and enhance your daily life with the calming sounds of brown noise. Download now and experience a new level of relaxation, focus, and sleep.

productHuntBadge.productHuntBadgeAlt: Brownoise - Relax, Focus, Sleep, Health | Product Hunt

title: Cipheroji - Encryption & Emoji
subtitle: Encrypting text to emoji
fullDescription: Cipheroji is a unique and fun way to encrypt your text. Transform your text into a series of emojis, providing an extra layer of encryption to keep your communications private and secure with the most reliable AES-256 encryption.
Emoji Encryption - Convert your text into a series of emojis, making them readable only to those with the corresponding decryption key.
AES-256 Encryption - Utilizes the industry-leading AES-256 encryption standard, ensuring the highest level of security for your texts.
Easy Decryption - Quickly decode emoji texts back into text with the correct key.
User-Friendly Interface - Simple and intuitive design for seamless encryption and decryption.
Secure - Combines advanced cryptographic techniques with the fun of emojis to provide robust security.

Why Choose Cipheroji? - Cipheroji offers a novel approach to text security. By leveraging the universal language of emojis, it provides a fun and engaging way to keep your conversations private. With the power of AES-256 encryption, you can be confident that your texts are protected by the most reliable encryption available.
Privacy and Security - Your privacy is our top priority. All encryption and decryption processes are performed locally on your device, ensuring that your texts remain secure and private.

productHuntBadge.productHuntBadgeAlt: Cipheroji - Encrypting text to emoji | Product Hunt

title: Dodge Zone
subtitle: Last the longest! Be a Leader!
fullDescription: Get ready for an exhilarating adventure in Dodge Zone! Your goal is to avoid collisions with obstacles and survive as long as possible. Only the fastest and most agile players will achieve the highest scores! The game gets progressively harder the longer you play, testing your reflexes and strategic thinking. Compete with players worldwide and climb to the top of the leaderboard.

title: Birthdays - All Time Intervals
subtitle: More Birthdays!
fullDescription: Stay organized and never miss a beat with Birthdays, your go-to app for tracking time intervals since important dates! Whether it's birthdays, anniversaries, or special occasions, Birthdays helps you keep track of time passed with ease. Never lose track of time again! Download Birthdays now and start tracking time intervals in style!
Precise Time Tracking: Effortlessly monitor the number of months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, and seconds since any important event.
Dynamic Updates: Watch as time intervals update in real-time, providing you with accurate and up-to-date information at a glance.
Sleek and Intuitive Design: Enjoy a sleek and intuitive interface designed for quick and easy navigation. Access all features with just a few taps.
Privacy and Security: Rest assured that your data is safe and secure. Birthdays prioritizes user privacy and data protection.

title: AI Writer - Easy Text Creation
subtitle: Creating stories, poems, songs
fullDescription: Unleash your creativity with AI Writer, the ultimate tool for generating and saving captivating text compositions! Whether you're crafting poems, composing songs, or creating immersive stories, AI Writer serves as your creative companion, providing an array of features to ignite your imagination.
Features:
Diverse Text Generation: AI Writer generates various text styles, including poems, songs, stories, and more, catering to every creative whim.
Visual Representation: Experience visually appealing representations of your creations with distinct color schemes and designs tailored to each text type.
Save and Organize: Effortlessly save your favorite texts and organize them for easy access in a user-friendly interface.
Detailed View: Dive into the details! Explore each composition's specifics—type, style, content, and more—in a comprehensive and engaging display.
Share Your Creations: Share your masterpieces with friends, family, or your audience with ease using the built-in sharing functionality.
Seamless Integration: Built with SwiftUI and Core Data, AI Writer ensures a seamless experience, combining elegant design with robust performance.
Unlock your writing potential and transform your ideas into beautifully crafted compositions. Explore the world of words with AI Writer — where creativity knows no bounds!

title: Clothtag
subtitle: Wardrobe Companion
fullDescription: Discover the ultimate clothing care companion with Clothtag – your all-in-one guide to understanding and preserving your favorite garments. Seamlessly organize your wardrobe, decipher care symbols, and stay on top of clothing maintenance effortlessly.
Wardrobe Organization Made Easy

Tired of the hassle of keeping track of your clothing items? Clothtag lets you catalog your wardrobe with ease. From chic dresses to cozy sweaters, neatly organize your clothing collection and always find what you're looking for.
Decode Care Symbols with Confidence

Unsure how to properly care for your clothes? Clothtag demystifies care labels and symbols. Whether it's washing, ironing, bleaching, or professional cleaning, our app provides clear explanations so you can keep your clothes looking their best.
Effortless Searching
Need to find that special outfit for the day? Our search features make it a breeze to locate your attire. No more digging through your closet – everything is just a tap away.
Snap and Store Clothes Images

Never forget what's in your wardrobe. Capture images of your clothes and easily associate them with clothing details. This handy feature helps you plan outfits, shop wisely, and create a visual closet.
Personalize Your Experience

With Clothtag, tailor your clothing care preferences. Select your favorite care labels, view detailed care information, and stay organized in a way that suits your unique style and clothing care routine.

Whether you're a fashion enthusiast or just want to make sure your clothes stand the test of time, Clothtag is your trusted companion for clothing care. Download now and make garment care effortless and enjoyable!

title: 4Levels Up
subtitle: Rise Up First!
fullDescription: Rules of the game:
On his turn, the player performs two actions: he moves one of his two characters to any adjacent cell of the field and completes construction, placing one of the levels on the cell next to him.
The character can climb no more than one level up, go down to any number of levels, or move along one level.

Construction takes place, as expected, in order: first, the first level is put, on it - the second, third and fourth. You can add new elements not only to the levels you created, but also to those created by your opponent.
The goal of the game is to create three levels and put your character on it. Accordingly, do not let your opponent do it first.
If 4 levels are built, it is impossible to install your character on them.

The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

title: Falling Bubbles Puzzle Match-3 Game
fullDescription: Collect bubbles in groups of the same colors so that they burst and do not fall.

You will find an exciting and at the same time simple game in which you have to shoot and thus collect bubbles into a group of the same color. If in a group of 3 or more bubbles with the same color, they burst and you are awarded points. The larger the group, the more points. A new line of bubbles is added periodically. Do not let the bubbles accumulate on the playing field and fall below the red line. Good game!

title: Gym Assistant Fitness Workouts
subtitle: Training diary, exercise guide
fullDescription: With a simple user-friendly design, Gym Assistant makes it easy to record your workouts, monitor progress, view your weight and reps history in exercises. If you have just started to train recently, you can always see the information on how to do the exercise correctly. And if you already have experience in training, you will be able to find something new, interesting tips and tricks.
Features
- Record your workouts. Add additional training data (workout duration, your weight, notes).
- View the history of all workouts. History to exercise.
- When recording exercise data (weight and reps) for each set, weight and repetitions from the previous workout are immediately displayed. This allows you to not be lazy and trying to do more.
- If you have routines - you can not create a new one, but simply select the previous one and click 'Repeat'.
- Easily edit exercises in your workout.
- View information on all exercises directly from the workout diary window.

- Information on all exercises for all muscle groups with a convenient search. The information contains the image of the exercise with the selection of a working muscle group. Technique of the exercise. Tips and tricks.
- If you do not find the exercise you need in the list, you can add new exercises.
